homeView.patchesConsentDialogText: ReVanced Patches needs to be downloaded.
homeView.patchesConsentDialogText3Sub: You can change this in settings at a later time.
homeView.updatesDisabled: Updating a patched app is currently disabled. Repatch the app again.

patcherView.armv7WarningDialogText: Patching on ARMv7 devices is not yet supported and might fail. Proceed anyways?
patcherView.requiredOptionDialogText: Some patch options have to be set.

appSelectorView.downloadToast: Download function is not available yet
appSelectorView.featureNotAvailableText: This application is a split APK and cannot be selected. Unfortunately, this feature is only available for rooted users at the moment. However, you can still install the application by selecting its APK files from your device's storage instead

patchesSelectorView.noSavedPatches:
No saved patch selection for the selected app.
Press Done to save the current selection.
patchesSelectorView.noPatchesFound: No patches found for the selected app

patchOptionsView.requiredOptionNull:
The following options have to be set:

${options}

patchItem.unsupportedPatchVersion: Patch is not supported for this app version.
patchItem.unsupportedRequiredOption: This patch contains a required option that is not supported by this app
patchItem.patchesChangeWarningDialogText:
It is recommended to use the default patch selection and options. Changing them may result in unexpected issues.

You'll need to turn on "Allow changing patch selection" in settings before changing any patch selection.

installerView.installTypeDescription: Select the installation type to proceed with.
installerView.warning: Disable auto updates for the patched app to avoid unexpected issues.
installerView.notificationText: Tap to return to the installer
installerView.screenshotDetected:
A screenshot has been detected. If you are trying to share the log, please share a text copy instead.

Copy log to clipboard?
installerView.noExit: Installer is still running, cannot exit...

settingsView.dynamicThemeHint: Enjoy an experience closer to your device
settingsView.sourcesLabelHint: Configure the source of patches and integrations
settingsView.sourcesResetDialogText: Are you sure you want to reset your sources to their default values?
settingsView.apiURLResetDialogText: Are you sure you want to reset your API URL to its default value?
settingsView.sourcesUpdateNote:
Note: Patches will be updated to the latest version automatically.

This will reveal your IP address to the server.
settingsView.apiURLHint: Configure the URL of the API to use
settingsView.contributorsHint: A list of contributors of ReVanced
settingsView.enablePatchesSelectionHint: Do not prevent selecting or deselecting patches
settingsView.enablePatchesSelectionWarningText:
Changing the selection of patches may cause unexpected issues.

Enable anyways?
settingsView.disablePatchesSelectionWarningText:
You are about to disable changing the selection of patches.
The default selection of patches will be restored.

Disable anyways?
settingsView.autoUpdatePatchesHint: Automatically update patches to the latest version
settingsView.universalPatchesHint: Display all apps and universal patches (may slow down the app list)
settingsView.versionCompatibilityCheckHint: Prevent selecting patches that are not compatible with the selected app version
settingsView.requireSuggestedAppVersionHint: Prevent selecting an app with a version that is not the suggested
settingsView.requireSuggestedAppVersionDialogText:
Selecting an app that is not the suggested version may cause unexpected issues.

Do you want to proceed anyways?
settingsView.restartAppForChanges: Restart the app to apply changes
settingsView.exportPatchesHint: Export patch selection to a JSON file
settingsView.importPatchesHint: Import patch selection from a JSON file
settingsView.resetStoredPatchesDialogText: The default selection of patches will be restored.
settingsView.resetStoredOptionsDialogText: Resetting patch options will remove all saved options.
settingsView.regenerateKeystoreHint: Regenerate the keystore used to sign apps
settingsView.regenerateKeystoreDialogText: Patched apps signed with the old keystore will no longer be able to be updated.
settingsView.exportKeystoreHint: Export the keystore used to sign apps
settingsView.importKeystoreHint: Import a keystore used to sign apps
settingsView.selectKeystorePasswordHint: Select keystore password used to sign apps
settingsView.jsonSelectorErrorMessage: Unable to use selected JSON file
settingsView.keystoreSelectorErrorMessage: Unable to use selected keystore file

appInfoView.unmountDialogText: Are you sure you want to unmount this app?
appInfoView.uninstallDialogText: Are you sure you want to uninstall this app?
appInfoView.rootDialogText:
App was installed with superuser permissions, but currently ReVanced Manager has no permissions.
Please grant superuser permissions first.
appInfoView.updateNotImplemented: This feature has not been implemented yet

installErrorDialog.mount_version_mismatch_description:
The installation failed due to the installed app being a different version than the patched app.

Install the version of the app you are mounting and try again.
installErrorDialog.mount_no_root_description:
The installation failed due to root access not being granted.

Grant root access to ReVanced Manager and try again.
installErrorDialog.mount_missing_installation_description:
The installation failed due to the unpatched app not being installed on this device in order to mount over it.

Install the unpatched app before mounting and try again.
installErrorDialog.status_failure_timeout_description:
The installation took too long to finish.

Would you like to try again?
installErrorDialog.status_failure_storage_description:
The installation failed due to insufficient storage.

Free up some space and try again.
installErrorDialog.status_failure_invalid_description:
The installation failed due to the patched app being invalid.

Uninstall the app and try again?
installErrorDialog.status_failure_incompatible_description:
The app is incompatible with this device.

Contact the developer of the app and ask for support.
installErrorDialog.status_failure_conflict_description:
The installation was prevented by an existing installation of the app.

Uninstall the installed app and try again?
installErrorDialog.status_failure_blocked_description:
The installation was blocked by ${packageName}.

Adjust your security settings and try again.
installErrorDialog.install_failed_verification_failure_desc:
The installation failed due to a verification issue.

Adjust your security settings and try again.
installErrorDialog.install_failed_version_downgrade_descrip:
The installation failed due to the patched app being a lower version than the installed app.

Uninstall the app and try again?
installErrorDialog.status_unknown_description: The installation failed due to an unknown reason. Please try again.
